# XmlDocumentExtensions.Render method

Renders the XML document to a string.

```csharp
public static string Render(this XmlDocument @this)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| this | The XmlDocument to render as a string. |

## Return Value

The XML document rendered as a string.

## Remarks

The resulting XML string will omit the XML declaration and be indented with two spaces. This is effectively the same as `XDocument.ToString()`.
